title: #io16 Clock
summary: Watch Face, Widget, LWP & Daydream based on the countdown for Google I/O 2016.
description: Based on the stylish countdown timer for Google I/O 2016: https://events.google.com/io2016/The app includes a highly customisable home-screen clock widget, live wallpaper, daydream, and watchface for Android Wear.The app is not official or affiliated with Google in any way.FAQ:Q: Why isn't the widget fully animated?A: Android widgets are not designed to animate and forcing them to do so seriously affects battery life. If you want to see the full animation please use the live wallpaper!If you want to make suggestions for new features, post your favourite configuration, see the latest change log, or get help with any problems, please see my Google+ community at https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/113955537219140914914/stream/ac2d6853-a264-4768-976d-e1f3181a6fa7Permissions:- In-app purchases: If you like the app you can leave a dollar (or equivalent in your currency) tip. All app content is free and tipping does not unlock anything new (except my gratitude <3).- Bind to a dream service - Necessary for Daydream functionality.- Wake lock - Necessary for Android Wear watchface functionality.- Read external storage - Necessary on many devices for choosing a custom background image.This project uses the fantastic uCrop image cropping library for handling background images. Check it out here: https://github.com/Yalantis/uCrop
descriptionHTML:
Based on the stylish countdown timer for Google I/O 2016: https://events.google.com/io2016/

The app includes a highly customisable home-screen clock widget, live wallpaper, daydream, and watchface for Android Wear.


The app is not official or affiliated with Google in any way.


FAQ:
Q: Why isn't the widget fully animated?
A: Android widgets are not designed to animate and forcing them to do so seriously affects battery life. If you want to see the full animation please use the live wallpaper!


If you want to make suggestions for new features, post your favourite configuration, see the latest change log, or get help with any problems, please see my Google+ community at https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/113955537219140914914/stream/ac2d6853-a264-4768-976d-e1f3181a6fa7



Permissions:
- In-app purchases: If you like the app you can leave a dollar (or equivalent in your currency) tip. All app content is free and tipping does not unlock anything new (except my gratitude <3).
- Bind to a dream service - Necessary for Daydream functionality.
- Wake lock - Necessary for Android Wear watchface functionality.
- Read external storage - Necessary on many devices for choosing a custom background image.



This project uses the fantastic uCrop image cropping library for handling background images. Check it out here: https://github.com/Yalantis/uCrop
comments: I like the look and the fact you can change the colors, but it gets stuck and stops changing time. Also, when you go to change its look, it just stays the same. So now I feel like I should uninstall this since it's not serving its purpose. I have Moto Z Play if that helps.

Looks great but there's a big bug! Thanks for the great widget dev! I like it but the last update causes the time to freeze on the widget. I couldn't notice a pattern or replicate the issue but I'm sure it's an easy fix. (On an Honor 8 - UK)

Awesome This has instantly become one of my favorite widgets!  Becoming a fan of the developer,  keep up the great work. I would like to see the widget automatically change to match with the background. I have open the app for it to take this effect.

Freezing at a point The look and feel is amazing. But it's not serving the main purpose. The clock gets strucked at some time and we need to remove the widget again to get it back into correct time. Please work it out

No problems, no lag, nothing The LWP and daydream are flawless in my opinion. All I need to say is that when setting up the daydream, to prevent screen burn in, turn the background to pitch black and make the inactive color to pitch black as well. You can tap the area of a number to see it.

Cool-looking Lots of color combinations to make, and it's great! One thing: is there a seconds time for the widget? If you add the seconds time for the widget, that would be great! And will increase to a 5-star rating too! ðŸ˜Š
recentChanges: Fixed glitching caused by default watch settings.
Now includes a fully customisable Watch Face for Android Wear!
- Change the LWP touch shortcut gesture (tap or double tap)
- Scroll LWP background if using a custom background image
- Crash when trying to choose background image.
- Wake lock - required for Android Wear watchface.
- Read external storage - required by many devices for choosing a background image.
